feed.title: GitHub Perl Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Perl in GitHub

entry.title: bestpractical/rt-extension-trailingsubjecttag
entry.summary:
NAME RT-Extension-TrailingSubjectTag - Switch RT's ticket ID tag to the end of email Subjects

INSTALLATION "perl Makefile.PL" "make" "make install" May need root permissions

Edit your /opt/rt4/etc/RT_SiteConfig.pm
    Add this line:

        Set(@Plugins, qw(RT::Extension::TrailingSubjectTag));

    or add "RT::Extension::TrailingSubjectTag" to your existing @Plugins
    line.

Clear your mason cache
        rm -rf /opt/rt4/var/mason_data/obj

Restart your webserver

AUTHOR Thomas Sibley trs@bestpractical.com

BUGS All bugs should be reported via email to bug-RT-Extension-TrailingSubjectTag@rt.cpan.org mailto:bug-RT-Extension-TrailingSubjectTag@rt.cpan.org or via the web at rt.cpan.org <http://rt.cpan.org/Public/Dist/Display.html?Name=RT-Extension-TrailingS ubjectTag>.
